text: Kaye Ballard (born Catherine Gloria Balotta; November 20, 1925 - January 21, 2019) was an American musical theatre, television actress, comedienne, and singer. == Biography == She was known for her role as Kaye Buell on the NBC sitcom The Mothers-in-Law. Ballard died of heart failure at her home in Rancho Mirage, California on January 21, 2019 at the age of 93.Kaye Ballard dies at 93, remembered for immense multiple talents and complex personal life ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Kaye Ballard website Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American musical theatre actors Category:American television actors Category:Singers from Cleveland Category:Comedians from Cleveland Category:Actors from Cleveland
title: Kaye Ballard
